summary: Nostalgic comedy set in the early 1960s, when the tango was all the rage. The "prodigal son" Tenho returns from his unlucky adventures in the city back to his parents' farm. Tenho becomes ... See full summary »
cast: Katariina Kaitue|Pertti Koivula|Anja Pohjola|Veikko Tiitinen|Tuula Väänänen|Taisto Reimaluoto|Riikka Räsänen|Tatu Kaihua|Heidi Hakkarainen|Reijo Taipale|Carl Mesterton|Jukka Puronlahti|Leo Raivio|Esa Halonen|Veikko Väänänen|Ville Hukkinen|Igor Honkanen|Kari Kinnunen|Kari Sara|Jukki Tuura
title: Onnen maa
